metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0085 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: JBoss Fuse did not enable encrypted passwords by default in its usage of Apache Zookeeper. This permitted sensitive information disclosure via logging to local users. Note: this description has been updated; previous text mistakenly identified the source of the flaw as Zookeeper. Previous text: Apache Zookeeper logs cleartext admin passwords, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the log.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Not for us, JBoss Fuse

criterions.comment: zookeeper package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
